Subsection.Text: No foreign copromoter may, directly or indirectly, participate in the promotion of, receive any remuneration from, or render any services in connection with any match involving a professional, unless the foreign copromoter has been issued a license therefor by the commission. No promoter may be associated with any foreign copromoter in promoting any match, unless the foreign copromoter has been issued a license.
A foreign copromoter by accepting a license agrees to be subject to all the provisions of this chapter.
A violation of this section is a misdemeanor of the second degree, punishable as provided in s. 775.082 or s. 775.083.
